info.name: Digital Wallet
info.description:
Comprehensive digital wallet management system providing user registration, wallet operations, transaction processing, and notification services.

Contact Support:
 Name: Digital Wallet Development Team
 Email: collinskboit@gmail.com

variable.description: Unique identifier of the wallet

request.description: Updates the status of a wallet (ACTIVE, INACTIVE, or LOCKED). Requires the wallet PIN for verification, OTP verification, and an optional reason for the status change. If OTP is not provided, the system will send an OTP and return 202 Accepted status requiring resubmission with OTP.

response.name: Successful status update
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Wallet status updated successfully",
  "requestId": "req_123456789",
  "data": {
    "walletId": "WLT_987654321",
    "accountNumber": "ACC_001234567890",
    "accountName": "John Doe Savings",
    "status": "INACTIVE",
    "reason": "Temporary suspension for security review",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T11:00:00Z"
  },
  "timestamp": "2024-01-15T11:00:00Z"
}

response.name: Status update request with OTP
response.body:

}

variable.description: Unique identifier of the wallet

request.description: Updates the PIN for a wallet. Requires the current PIN for verification, OTP verification, and ensures the new PIN is different from the current one. If OTP is not provided, the system will send an OTP and return 202 Accepted status requiring resubmission with OTP.

variable.description: Unique identifier of the sender's wallet

request.description: Transfers funds from one wallet to another. Requires sender's PIN for authorization, OTP verification, and sufficient balance in the sender's wallet. If OTP is not provided, the system will send an OTP and return 202 Accepted status requiring resubmission with OTP.

item.name: Top up wallet via M-Pesa simulation

variable.description: Unique identifier of the wallet to top up

request.description: Adds funds to a wallet by simulating an M-Pesa transaction. Requires M-Pesa transaction ID and phone number for verification.

response.name: Invalid request data or top-up failed

variable.description: Unique identifier of the wallet

request.description: Generates an account statement for a wallet within a specified date range. Supports pagination and multiple output formats (PDF, JSON, CSV).

response.name: Invalid date range or request parameters

variable.description: Unique identifier of the wallet

request.description: Generates a QR code containing wallet information for easy sharing and payments. The QR code can be used by other users to initiate transfers to this wallet.

variable.description: Unique identifier of the wallet

request.description: Retrieves the current balance and basic information for a specific wallet

variable.description: Unique identifier of the wallet to delete

request.description: Permanently deletes a wallet and all associated data. This action cannot be undone. Requires the wallet PIN for verification and OTP confirmation. If OTP is not provided, the system will send an OTP and return 202 Accepted status requiring resubmission with OTP.

query.description: User ID for whom the wallet is being created

request.description: Creates a new digital wallet for a user with specified account name, currency, and PIN. The wallet will be assigned a unique wallet ID and account number.

query.description: User ID for whom the wallet is being created

response.name: Invalid request data or validation errors

query.description: User ID for whom the wallet is being created

variable.description: Unique identifier of the user whose status is to be updated

request.description: Updates the status of a specific user account. This endpoint allows administrators to activate, deactivate, suspend, or change the status of user accounts for account management purposes. OTP verification is required for this sensitive operation.

response.name: User status updated successfully
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "User status updated successfully from ACTIVE to SUSPENDED",
  "requestId": "req_123456789",
  "data": {
    "userId": "usr_987654321",
    "firstName": "John",
    "lastName": "Doe",
    "email": "john.doe@example.com",
    "mobile": "1234567890",
    "status": "SUSPENDED",
    "previousStatus": "ACTIVE",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z",
    "reason": "Account suspended due to suspicious activity"
  },
  "timestamp": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z"
}

item.name: Perform KYC verification for a user

variable.description: Unique identifier of the user for KYC verification

request.description: Submits Know Your Customer (KYC) verification documents and information for a registered user. This endpoint processes identity documents, selfie images, and personal information to verify user identity. OTP verification is required for this sensitive operation.

response.name: KYC verification submitted successfully
KYC verification request with OTP code

variable.description: Unique identifier of the user whose profile is to be retrieved

request.description: Retrieves comprehensive profile information for a specific user including personal details, account status, KYC verification status, and associated wallet information.

response.name: Internal Server Error - Unexpected system error occurred

request.description: Creates a new user account with the provided information and automatically creates an associated wallet. This endpoint validates all user information and ensures unique mobile numbers and email addresses.

response.name: Accepted - OTP required for user registration
Registration validation failed

  "message": "Validation failed",

}

variable.description: Unique identifier of the notification to mark as read

request.description: Marks a specific notification as read by the user. This updates the notification status and sets the read timestamp.

response.name: Invalid notification ID or notification already read

variable.description: Unique identifier of the notification to delete

request.description: Permanently deletes a specific notification. This action cannot be undone and the notification will be removed from the user's notification history.

response.name: Invalid notification ID or deletion failed
Notification not found

variable.description: Unique identifier of the user whose notifications to mark as read

request.description: Marks all notifications for a specific user as read. This is useful for clearing notification badges and marking bulk notifications as read.

response.name: All notifications marked as read successfully
Invalid user ID or operation failed

variable.description: Unique identifier of the user whose unread notifications to retrieve

request.description: Retrieves only unread notifications for a specific user with pagination support. Useful for displaying notification badges and alerts.

variable.description: Unique identifier of the user whose notification counts to retrieve

request.description: Retrieves notification counts for a specific user, including total, unread, and counts by type. Useful for displaying notification badges and dashboard statistics.

variable.description: Unique identifier of the user whose notifications to retrieve

request.description: Retrieves all notifications for a specific user with pagination support. Returns both read and unread notifications ordered by creation date.

variable.description: Wallet ID

request.description: Generate a comprehensive account statement for a wallet within a specified date range
